General.Name: Rex Trueform Group Ltd
General.Description: Rex Trueform Group Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the retail of clothing and accessories in South Africa. It operates through Retail, Property, and Water Infrastructure segments. The company offers ladies' and men's clothing, shoes, costume jewelry, related fashion accessories, and cosmetics through branded Queenspark outlets located in South Africa. Rex Trueform Group Limited also invests in properties; and has investments in a private water and wastewater utility group that operates in South Africa. The company was formerly known as Rex Trueform Clothing Company Limited and changed its name to Rex Trueform Group Limited in January 2018. The company was founded in 1937 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa. Rex Trueform Group Limited is a subsidiary of African and Overseas Enterprises Limited.
General.Address: 263 Victoria Road, Cape Town, South Africa, 7925
